body:
Evening/Morning/Other ya'll!
Today, I'd like to put out three questions primarily centred on the topic of the game modes. We are always looking for better ways to improve the gameplay experience and I'd like to put out there a few question for you all to answer and discuss. 

Today's Topics:-

What do you find fun and interesting about the Avicus Network game modes? 

What improvements would you like to see from existing game modes? 

Is there any game modes you'd like replaced/removed? If so, why?

replies.body:
What do you find fun and interesting about the Avicus Network game modes? 
-Nebula: Due it's the most played Gamemode, there are always nice and funny people on. You also have a big selection option. There are Old, large, small, middle size maps, for everyone is something in. The Game is really good and it's cool to play. Sometimes it laggs, but this only for short time.
-Walls: I usually don't play Walls very often, because I made bad experience with the gamemode on other servers. But if I play a game. The players are nice to me. The Maps are great too. 
-CTH: my second favourite gamemode (after Nebula). It's nice to play (dafaq, why I use "nice" so often?). The Maps are great aswell, but more new maps would be great.
-Elimination: I only played the gamemode 1 time, sadly. But it was great! I don't know why noone is playing it.
-Avicade: Very nice gamemode(?). The Maps are good. Good gamemodes, but not enough.

What improvements would you like to see from existing game modes? 
-Walls: I would like to see, more options in the mapmaking. Like other blocks as the walls, maybe more than 2 walls and more than 4 teams?
-Nebula: more complex YMLs. More possibilitys in map making.
-CTH: Not much to say. It's cool how it is :)
-Nexus: Also more possibilities in the mapmaking and the YML coding (?).
-Elimination: Name change! The gamemode needs a namechange. Nobody actually knows what is Elimination. If you ask a minecraft player what is Survival Games he knows what it is, at elimination not :( I also would like to see, that players can submit a Elimination/Survival Games Map. I know the Plug in autogenerates maps, but they don't have chest and not really much recources on it.
-Avicade: I would like to see more games! We only have 2. That's not enough. I also would like to see a "Avicade - Game Comitee". In the comitee are "experts", the "experts" are the voices of the players. The players can contact them via skype and tell them their game suggestions. The comitee will have a meeting every week/second week, there will be discussed what gamemode would have a chance to the popular and wich not.

Is there any game modes you'd like replaced/removed? If so, why?
-Elimination: [replaced] with Survival Games or Survival Games with a twist. Like everywhere chest, but with kits. Or just change the name and add chest.
-The other ones are all fine, keep them.

Maybe add to the OP: What gamemodes do you like to see on the Avicus Network and if the person made a game suggestion, he can insert the link to the suggestion.

replies.body:
What do you find fun and interesting about the Avicus Network game modes?
I think the main selling point that got me into Avicus when I first got here was the whole prestige and leveling up system which is not that common so that was cool.

Currently I love Nebula and think it is fine as it is, however maybe it could do with a few less maps.

Nexus is my favourite game though as I just love all the maps and the kits and just everything really.

  Walls would be my 3rd favourite and is decent (I was never a big fan of walls anyway) but I like some of the more original themed maps.

CaptureTheHill I really like this mode but hardly anyone plays it which is very disappointing. I feel like CTH should be added into Nexus just like how Nebula has TDM the odd time to break up the constant DTM.

Avicade I think should just be removed. At most times I might see 5 people on it which is just rare in itself so I think should just be removed.

Elimination as with Avicade should be removed too and  I think changed to Survival Games, which players are more comfortable with and lets be real it is really fun and will attract more people to the server.

What improvements would you like to see from existing game modes? 
Oh I answered that basically up above...

Is there any game modes you'd like replaced/removed? If so, why?
Also answered up above!

replies.body:
What do you find fun and interesting about the Avicus Network game modes? 
I'm gonna talk about eonly 3 of em cuz im lazy.

Well, let's talk about Nebula....Yes, we did get the idea from OCN. But imho, Nebula is 25x better than project ares. Who knows, maybe it's because I'm too use to Avicus. :)

Avicade is sooo addicting! All though there are only 2 games, it's still one of the best things on avicus! Nuff said.

CTH is a game that belongs to only Avicus. This is one of the best gamemodes we have ever made. The pvp, the get to the middle before the timer runs out, is just insanely fun! 




What improvements would you like to see from existing game modes? 
Fix the compass bugs in elimination, get more people to play it, and add sg to it! People say it's a combo of HG and SG when really, its 99.99% HG and 00.01% sg.The only sg-ish thing is the supply drops.


Is there any game modes you'd like replaced/removed? If so, why?

ELIM ---->>>>> SG & HG

That's gonna be my opinion, Maybe some peole won't like it D: -

Walls- Good game, Very fun, I don't care it's not unique. It's walls with kits doe. No improvements needed.

Add some features like new kits.
Avicade- Awesome gamemode! Super unique, Very fun! Add more mini-games to there.
Another thing. The biggest wanted feature.
Add more prestiges. In all the games. It will make bored people who reached prestige 5 and level 50, and left avicus, make them back! It will make the gameplay More interesting. As i already made a post about that.
So, Howsie. Thanks for making topics like this!

replies.body:
What do you find fun and interesting about the Avicus Network game modes? Although not really unique, there's a goal to them. I personally can't enjoy playing a game without a goal in mind. Setting personal goals is alright, but I just reallly can't get into it. With the ability to level up I can push myself through each prestige and be rewarded with a star :D

What improvements would you like to see from existing game modes? CTH has to have some improvements. The kill streak rewards need to be stronger and possibly add in a few more? It can get quite bland seeing the same 5 items appear over and over.
Elimination could use some help. There definitely has to be a way to bring it some more traffic. Possibly merge it with SG? I'm not the best with ideas for these kinds of things :c 

Is there any game modes you'd like replaced/removed? If so, why? Possibly combine CTH with Nexus. Not too sure if people would like that.

I'm just going to list each gamemode and put my opinions on it.

Nebula: Obviously an amazing game.  The only criteria I have for it is to have more gameplay inducing maps, add some more gamemodes as opposed to strictly DTM and occasionally TDM, but I'm not creative so I have absolutely no ideas as far as that goes.
Nexus: A basic Kit TDM, but it draws in a lot of fun, it's personally my favorite.  Nexus simply needs bug fixes all over the place, and maybe some new kits here and there to spice it up.
Avicade: A fun idea, but nobody plays it because there's only two gamemodes for it.  Just some creative ideas are needed.
CTH: CTH is a phenomenal game, it just needs attention.  Events could be scheduled centered around CTH to get more players to consistantly play on it.
Walls: Personally, I don't see any changes needed for walls.
Elimination: Like CTH, it needs events scheduled around it.  Also, it needs more RAM, because out of the three or so games I've played of it, two of them crashed before the game ended.

replies.body:
Nebula is my favorite gamemode, and 95% of my time on Avicus is spent on it. However, I am starting to play less than I used to, mainly because of the Avicore update. A lot of my favorite maps were either changed or removed completely, and I don't even bother playing on the new maps. I would suggest adding building blocks such as wood in the points shop, as well as adding the regeneration potions back. Maybe add some more items in the points shop, since if I join a game, after 3-5 matches I have around 40-50 points. If it's full of OitN maps, then I'll have 80-100 points. The only useful items I can really buy are golden apples and spanky spades.

Also, why are TDM maps in Nebula in the first place? They don't belong in Nebula. Isn't Nexus a TDM gamemode? That's where those maps belong, unless it's OitN.

I'm usually on the McZone servers, because there I can enjoy gameplay without having to even think about those new maps, with aesthetics a higher priority than gameplay. I can enjoy maps such as Quintus and Senex, without having to play something like Diamond Shore or Yellowstone (sorry Evo). 

Nexus is my second favorite gamemode. I'm not from McZone so I have no idea how it was like back then, or what the maps were like. I really enjoy it now, and I don't think anything really needs to be changed.

I've only played Elimination once, and got bored of it quickly. I would suggest removing it and adding Survival Games. This would attract a ton of new players.

replies.body:
I will just place some geneal thoughts:

1: stats: game modes should have rank signs posted in the hub somewhere with interesting stats and a top 10 rank .  For example nebula could have most monuments broken this week or month. Different stats for each gamemode: maybe a lounge with those boards.

2: population : a general idea I am seeing from other posts is that players want to see more people playing. That bulls down to everyone ( owner and staff ) getting a new fire under there butts and getting active. I mean Avicus is ranked pretty low these days as compared to where it was. People miss Mczone because of the friendships , the people, and lastly was the game modes. Fill up the server and see what happens. I am not saying that all staff members are in a relaxed state, but I know from reading posts that some higher ranking staff admit to having poor focus, spending less time on avicus, and not giving certain game modes attention. We all lose focus at times, but I can see that focus has been lost in a lot of ways and it really shows. It shows in the player counts, it shows in the time it takes to implement solutions , and It shows with the amount of time not given to avicus by the staff.

3: gamemodes - I don't have a lot to say really on this. Other than not much time has been put into developing the current gamemodes : I mean nebula is a great game mode, but I haven't seen much done  with the points store. I also see that unless you use the points store you can't track your kills. Seems odd that there is not a command or something where you can see your stats for the current match- bow kills, sword kills, deaths , etc.  I also see that everyone is asking to be able to add friends, and that feature is Mia , I'm sure there is some long process to add a friend and message them , but it's hit and miss and not many know about it and its for sure not easy but is really needed, it is just another development problem. 

Kits and team rewards - the kits are ok in nexus but they do need tweaked. The kits in walls are very broken.  Look at the walls kits and you will see about 3-4 that are useful, the rest are a complete let down.  A healing potion as a kit item? Really?, or how about a 5 sec random buff, you have to stop , eat and hope the 5sec buff helps??? Nope. Stomper kit where you still take fall damage? Or the famous barbarian kit in walls , 5sec of str after a kill? So limited and unless your fighting 2,at a time useless. What about team rewards in Nebula, that would be awesome, but again. not developed.  I  could go on and on, but the bottom line is no one is developing our current game modes. Cth and elimination fail due to population as does the under developed avicade nothing wrong with the game-modes . Combining game modes may help, but I really can't say. What can be said is that if the dev staff and admin staff and the map staff sit down and talk after reading all these posts Avicus still has a shot. There really isn't a reason for us to have the low population we have, other than staying not focused or not as committed as could be. I also think admin staff needs a higher since if urgency, more updates to the player base and more contact about the next exciting thing... I mean what awesome news do we have? We had a map testing event fail , then a map update that was going to take 1-2 days, but it's been over two days and no update in any way. I just think the community should be informed and updated, and I'm not sure the admin staff has a good communication policy.

Thanks for reading! This post is not directed at any person so please do not comment that I am picking on any one. I am just stating my opinion, and any post defending any group or staff member is not needed.   ( typed on my phone, sorry for any typos)

replies.body:
What do you find fun and interesting about the Avicus Network game modes? 
The variety - I love how each gamemode has it's own type, with different ways of how it goes, this is able to apeal to a much larger range of users, whom of which either love the fun and exhilarating mini games of Avicade, to the Adrenalin rush of Nebula.
Each gamemode allows users to gain XP, this sets a goal for the user, to pursue it, until eventually, the hard work pays off, and you get the gratitude of the star next to your name, as a sign of your achievement.

What improvements would you like to see from existing game modes? 
I believe there should be more prestiges, to set even higher goals for users.
more diverse maps being added to the rotation roster.
More mods need to be more active, to ensure they can react to player reports in time, to take action
Team staking is a problem that needs to end, and some good suggestions have come up in the past.

Is there any game modes you'd like replaced/removed? If so, why?
I don't believe any gamemode should beremoved, though more work should be put into Aviade, to bring more users to it, as well as CTH and Elimination, Hunger Games should be brought back, as well as Skywars, all of which were great gamemodes in the day, and brought many users to the server

sadly, since their removal, many users have left because of this.
I feel that more users would return if all these game modes where brought back, resulting in a bigger, more vibrant community! 

Thanks, Zeddy :3 <3
